bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with niu pi xuan 牛皮癬 , ox-hide xuan -illness. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 19 lists 遍身牛皮癬方 , … 雌黃末入輕粉，豬脂調抹 , “Recipes for ox-hide xuan -illness affecting the entire body: “Mix ci huang powder with qing fen and lard and apply externally”. Pu ji fang 普濟方 281 quotes this and writes 遍身皮癬 , “ Xuan -illness affecting the skin of the entire body”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ci huang 雌黃 quotes the latter version and writes 牛皮頑癬 , “ Stubborn ox-hide xuan -illness ”.
